Package jdk.test.lib.hotspot.ir_framework

Annotation Interface ForceCompileClassInitializer

@Retention(RUNTIME) public @interface ForceCompileClassInitializer
Force a compilation of the static class initializer method (<clinit>) of the annotated test or helper class immediately at the specified level:

  • CompLevel.ANY (default): Highest available compilation level is selected which is usually CompLevel.C2

  • CompLevel.C1: Level 1: C1 compilation without any profile information.

  • CompLevel.C1_LIMITED_PROFILE: Level 2: C1 compilation with limited profile information: Includes Invocation and backedge counters.

  • CompLevel.C1_FULL_PROFILE: Level 3: C1 compilation with full profile information: Includes Invocation and backedge counters with MDO.

  • CompLevel.C2: Level 4: C2 compilation with full optimizations.

  • CompLevel.SKIP: Does not apply to @ForceCompileClassInitializer and results in a TestFormatException.

  • CompLevel.WAIT_FOR_COMPILATION: Does not apply to @ForceCompileClassInitializer and results in a TestFormatException.

Using this annotation on non-classes results in a TestFormatException.

  • Optional Element Summary

    Optional Elements
    Modifier and Type
    Optional Element
    Description
    CompLevel
    value
    The compilation level to compile the static class initializer method (<clinit>) at.

  • Element Details

    • value

      CompLevel value
      The compilation level to compile the static class initializer method (<clinit>) at.
      Default:
      ANY
